{{Location Intro|description=<p>[[Klee]]'s treasure is buried here, but it is stolen by an [[Abyss Mage]] during the events of her [[Story Quest]], "[[The Mystery of the Girl in Red's Treasure]]."</p>}}

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Interact with the sign after the quest)
:'''"My Treasure":''' There's some scruffy handwriting on this wooden post: "My Treasure."
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
* The words on the sign are written in the [[Teyvat Script]] and read "My Goodie."
